tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyManagementSystem (
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_usage DECIMAL,
    threshold DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    device_id INT,
    energy_usage DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id, timestamp),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES energy_thresholds(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES EnergyConsumption(device_id)
);
